titleInfo.title: ENZYMATIC FRAGMENT SUBSTITUTION AS A TOOL IN PROTEIN DESIGN

mods.abstract: An easy and rapid enzymatic method is described which allows replacement of P'-residues in bovine pancreatic trypsin inhibitor. Insertion of Xaa-Arg or Xaa-Lys into a BPTI fragment lacking P1' = Ala16 and P2' = Arg17 was carried out in a "one pot" reaction catalysed by trypsin in the presence of 80% 1,4 butanediol.
